rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0001
rows.name:
Hmm... what's this?
"The hero's favorite dish"?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0002
rows.name:
What's up, Nia?
Did you find something
you want to eat?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0003
rows.name: Hey! Great find, Nia!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0004
rows.name:
This is a famous dish that was
supposedly the favorite of
the hero Adel in the past!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0005
rows.name:
They say it uses an authentic mix of
spices passed down for 500 years.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0006
rows.name:
Well, since Luxuria is extremely cold,
it makes sense that Adel would like
spicy food.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0007
rows.name: Spicy food...?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0008
rows.name:
Adel liked this sort of thing?
Heroes have weird tastes...

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0009
rows.name:
That's rude, Nia.
It's actually quite delicious.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0010
rows.name:
Don't tell me you can't handle
spicy food?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0011
rows.name:
What...
is it wrong to not like spicy food?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0012
rows.name:
Hahaha, for all your tough talk,
you're still such a child at heart...

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0013
rows.name:
What's that supposed to mean!?
Are you picking a fight,
Turtle-chan!?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0014
rows.name:
Calm down, don't get so worked up.
I'll buy you some,
just give it a try.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0015
rows.name: What about you, Hikari? Want some?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0017
rows.name: Huh? What's up?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0018
rows.name: Um, well, you see...

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0019
rows.name:
Adel...
couldn't handle spicy food, you know.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0020
rows.name: What?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0021
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0022
rows.name: What exactly does that mean?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0023
rows.name:
So "The hero's favorite dish"
wasn't actually his favorite?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0024
rows.name:
So the advertising
slogan is just lying?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0101
rows.name:
That's right.
I've never seen him eating it.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0102
rows.name:
Adel would get a stomachache
from even the mildest spicy food.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0103
rows.name:
Haha!
So even the great hero
had some childish traits...

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0104
rows.name:
You're kidding me!
You can't tell me stories like that.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0105
rows.name:
My whole image of the hero Adel
is crumbling away!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0106
rows.name:
Hey, hey, Hikari,
don't you have any more
interesting stories?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0107
rows.name:
Interesting stories, hmm...
I wonder if there were any?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0108
rows.name:
What was the hero's actual
favorite food then?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0109
rows.name:
...I believe Adel was fond of
pan-fried Tartari.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0110
rows.name: That's just like Rex!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0111
rows.name: Yeah.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0112
rows.name:
He would get really excited
whenever it was on the menu.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0113
rows.name:
Seems the hero had quite
childish taste in food...

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0114
rows.name: What else can you tell us?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0115
rows.name: Hold on, hold on! That's enough!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0116
rows.name:
Don't ruin my image of the hero Adel
any more than this!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0117
rows.name:
What's the big deal?
It just shows the hero was a regular
person like anyone else.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0118
rows.name:
Look who's the big kid
now, Turtle-chan!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0119
rows.name:
Don't be ridiculous!
That doesn't make me feel any better!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0120
rows.name: Damn it.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0121
rows.name:
I'll have to reread
"The Legend of Hero Adel" to restore
my mental image of him...

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0201
rows.name:
That's right.
It's a complete fabrication.
Total nonsense.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0202
rows.name:
What, it's a fraud?
What a terrible shop.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0203
rows.name:
...Hold on a second.
We haven't proven it's fake yet.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0204
rows.name: Eh?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0205
rows.name:
Even if it wasn't Adel's favorite,
there's still historicaln
tradition behind it!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0206
rows.name:
It's a 500-year-old traditional recipe!
A little exaggeration is forgivable,
don't you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0207
rows.name:
For all we know, Adel might have tried 
 bite when Hikari wasn't around
and thought it was tasty!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0208
rows.name: Don't get so worked up, Turtle-chan.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0209
rows.name: Who's worked up?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0210
rows.name: Look, all I'm saying is...

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0211
rows.name:
It's wrong to dismiss a historically
significant dish as fake
without evidence!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0212
rows.name: ...Oh, I get it now.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0213
rows.name: Zeke, you like this dish, don't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0214
rows.name: ...Ugh.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0215
rows.name:
And you only like it because
they advertised it as Adel's favorite,
don't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0216
rows.name: ...Uhh.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0217
rows.name:
Wow, so obvious!
That's why you were getting worked up?

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0218
rows.name: You're like a little kid!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0219
rows.name: S-So what if I am?!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0220
rows.name:
I've been eating this since
I was a child, truly believing
it was Adel's favorite!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0221
rows.name:
This has been the dream food
of children for 500 years!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0222
rows.name:
I won't let all that be ruined
by some offhand comment
from a single Blade!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0223
rows.name:
But the truth is that Adel
couldn't handle spicy food...

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0224
rows.name:
So there's no way he would
willingly eat it, not even
a single bite.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0225
rows.name: Aaaagh!

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0226
rows.name:
My memories...
my innocent childhood beliefs...

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0227
rows.name: Now... I can't trust anyone anymore...

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0228
rows.name: Don't take it so hard, Turtle-chan.

rows.label: kizunatalk032_msg0229
rows.name: I'll treat you, so cheer up, okay?!
